resources.string: This activity displays a list, using a ListView component. We will place here a names of space stars.
This is a demo intent service.
Please wait, list of banks is downloading now ...
Click on a needed bank to see its details.
This service runs by default (on a UI thread). You may see that UI jams when this service performs.
This service runs on separate thread.
This service uses a Messenger. This mechanism renders a sending of data(message), not the activity requests it on demand. One needs to implement a way to receive the data on demand.

Since activities do get recreated after screen is rotated, the data of a view located on this activity should get lost. But android doesn\'t allow this to happen. You may rotate the screen to see that its true. Even that TextView and EditText present lower are set to text \'Vlad\' programmatically. Since they have an id set to them, android is able to recover them, using specific mechanism. But it doesn\'t work for primitives or objects. In this case developer has to use onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) and onSaveInstanceState(Bundle savedInstanceState) methods.
"Computing on a UI thread and updating it"
"Click button that runs an intent that matches the intent-filters in 2 activities"
